infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app requests access to your location to better understand how well-being is experienced in different places. Your location is stored with reduced accuracy to protect your privacy.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app requests access to your location to better understand how well-being is experienced in different places. Your location is stored with reduced accuracy to protect your privacy.
